name: conut_ops
description: AI-driven decision-support agent for Conut bakery & café chain. Covers combo optimization, demand forecasting, staffing estimation, expansion feasibility, and coffee/milkshake growth strategy across 4 branches.
author: Conut AI Engineering Team — AUB

tools.name: ask_operations_agent
tools.description: Send any natural-language business question to the Conut Chief of Operations Agent. It handles intent classification, entity extraction, and analytics internally.

question.description: A natural-language business question about combos, forecasts, staffing, expansion, or coffee/milkshake growth. Examples: 'What are the top combos for Conut Jnah?', 'Forecast demand for Conut - Tyre next 4 months', 'How many staff for the evening shift?'

answer.description: Pre-formatted Markdown answer ready to display

data.description: Raw structured data from the analytics service

tools.name: discover_branches
tools.description: Get valid branch names, shift values, and default parameters. Use this to validate user input before calling the agent.

tools.name: health_check
tools.description: Verify the backend is running and responsive.
